Retrieves the pending authorization summary segment from IMS using the account ID and sets appropriate status flags based on the result.
Clears the authorization detail display fields on the screen to prepare for new data population.
Fetches and displays the next set of authorization records after navigating back a page, updating page tracking and navigation flags.
Retrieves the authorization summary segment from IMS database using the account ID as a key.
Repositions the IMS database cursor to the authorization detail segment matching the saved authorization key.
Initializes the authorization data screen fields by clearing transaction details and setting default values for all five authorization lines.
Processes forward pagination by retrieving up to five authorization records starting from the current position and updating pagination tracking variables.
Repositions the IMS database cursor to the authorization detail segment corresponding to the saved authorization key when navigating backward via PF7.
Retrieves the next authorization detail segment from the IMS database and sets appropriate status flags based on the result.
Populates the screen fields and working storage with authorization data for the current record based on the index.
Attempts to retrieve the next authorization record after processing a page to determine if a next page is available.
Sends the authorization list screen with an error message when a system error occurs during IMS data retrieval.
Displays the authorization list screen with an error message if repositioning in the IMS database fails.
Populates the screen header with current date, time, transaction ID, and program name.
Retrieves card cross-reference data by account ID and updates customer and card details if found; otherwise displays an error message.
Reads account data using the account ID from the card cross-reference; if not found or error occurs, sets up error message and sends screen.
Retrieves customer data using the customer ID from the card cross-reference; if not found or error occurs, prepares and displays an error message.
Retrieves pending authorization summary for the account ID using IMS/DB; sets status flags based on result and handles errors if encountered.
Sends an error message to the screen when the card cross-reference record is not found or a system error occurs during file read.
Sends an error message to the screen when the card cross-reference record is not found or a system error occurs during file read.
Sends an error message to the screen when the account record is not found or a system error occurs during file read.
Sends an error message to the screen when the account record is not found or a system error occurs during file read.
Sends an error message to the screen when the customer record is not found or a system error occurs during file read.
Sends an error message to the screen when a customer is not found or a system error occurs during customer data retrieval.
Schedules the PSB for IMS processing before attempting to retrieve the pending authorization summary.
Displays an error message on the screen when a system error occurs while reading the authorization summary segment.
Sends an error message to the screen if the PSB fails to schedule successfully.
